text: "(Shake, Shake, Shake) Shake Your Booty" is a 1976 hit song from KC and the Sunshine Band. The song was #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 and on the soul singles chart. The lyrics caused controversy due to their sexual nature. ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== Chart (1976) Peak position Australia (Kent Music Report) 16 South Africa (Springbok Radio) 8 US Billboard Hot 100. AllMusic. All Media Network. 1 US Billboard Hot Disco Singles 6 US Billboard Hot Soul Singles 1 US Cash Box. Cash Box. 1 US Record World 1 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (1976) Rank Canada Top Singles (RPM) 19 US Billboard Hot 100 26 US Billboard Hot Soul Singles. Billboard. 4 US Cash Box. Cash Box magazine. 10 ===All-time charts=== Chart (1958-2018) Position US Billboard Hot 100 218 == References == Category:1976 songs Category:Pop songs Category:KC and the Sunshine Band songs
title: (Shake, Shake, Shake) Shake Your Booty
